Character.Description: A striking, confident middle-aged woman with a cyberpunk edge; intelligent, seductive, and unapologetically powerful.

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, pronounced curves
Build.LowerBody: Full hips and thighs, assertive stance

Face.Makeup: High-contrast makeup; sharp eyeliner, metallic accents, bold magenta or neon lips
Face.Complexion: Fair-light skin with cool highlights and cinematic contrast

Hair.Style: Loose waves or wind-swept, dramatic movement

Base.ColorPalette: Black, magenta, electric purple, cyan accents
Base.Material: Leather, synthetic tech fabrics, reflective elements

Situational.Accessories: LED accents, metallic jewelry, smart wearables

Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, nature photography quality

Lighting.Shadows: Long and blue-tinted, soft edges from diffused winter light

ColorPalette.Treatment: Cool and desaturated, high contrast between snow and dark trees, subtle warmth in skin tones

Situation.Name: Portrait
Situation.Setting: Snow-covered Canadian forest with birch and evergreen trees
Situation.Camera: Medium close-up, three-quarter view, shallow depth of field

CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing among trees, winter coat over outfit
CharacterPose.Gesture: Arms crossed for warmth or hands in pockets

Environment.Name: Snow-laden branches
Environment.Description: Evergreen branches heavy with fresh snow

KeyDetails: Warm skin tones against cold environment
Situation.LightingFocus: Diffused overcast light with blue shadows and warm highlights on face
